news.title: Queens of the Stone Age Announce Fall 2025 Tour of North America
news.summary: The band will play all-new song arrangements on the Catacombs Tour

news.title: Wet Leg Share Video for New Song “Davina McCall”: Watch
news.summary: The third single from the band’s upcoming album, Moisturizer, is named after the host of the British Big Brother

news.title: The Lemonheads Announce Tour and First Original Album in 19 Years, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: “In the Margin” leads Love Chant, Evan Dando and the band’s comeback album with contributions from J Mascis, Juliana Hatfield, and more

news.title: Big Freedia Announces Gospel Album Pressing Onward
news.summary: A reflection on faith and hope, the bounce queen’s third studio LP is dedicated to her late partner, Devon Hurst

news.title: Caroline Polachek Shares New Song “On the Beach”: Listen
news.summary: She worked with Danny L Harle and Hideo Kojima on the song for the new video game Death Stranding 2: On the Beach

news.title: Nourished by Time, Dexter in the Newsagent, and More: This Week’s Pitchfork Selects Playlist
news.summary: Our weekly playlist highlights songs that our writers, editors, and contributors are listening to on repeat

news.title: Patrick Walden, Former Babyshambles Guitarist, Dies at 46
news.summary: The London-born musician also played in the bands Fluid, the Six Cold Thousand, and the White Sport
